title: Sibling Advicery: Big Feet/Tipping Queens
description:
Want to know where to find cute shoes for big feet? Curious about what tipping etiquette you should follow at drag shows? Wondering how to bring up polyamory to your current partner? This week on Advicery Bob and Monét give advice on listener submitted rumblings. Tune in for all the answers and so much more!!
Find your perfect place at Apartments.com
Want to see exclusive Sibling Rivalry Bonus Content? Head over to www.patreon.com/siblingrivalrypodcast to be the first to see our latest Sibling Rivalry Podcast Videos!
@BobTheDragQueen
@MonetXChange
